comments:
1. on the Extensions page of the plugin editor, press Add...
2. in the extension point selection dialog, switch to the 'Extension Wizards' tab and select the 'Project builder and Nature' template.

You get the following NPE:

Modified the pde.ui.template's plugin.xml to correct the "template" element for the 'Project Builder and Nature' newExtension element.  This was causing the NPE.  So the wizard should work better now.

In addition, I do a check for where we failed with the NPE in org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.extension.PointSelectionPage.  If the template value does not resolve, we fail gracefully (error dialog saying problems creating wizard) instead of NPE.
